information: The maximum number of points is 15. Those are the cross-code-review and cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: Linting can be run and doesn't produce any errors or warnings
Tests can be run and the test coverage is equal or higher than 60%
When value is entered into the search bar and submitted, the call will be send to an api with an entered value
If the value has been entered previoulsy, search should restore it from the LS and make a call to an api with this previoulsy entered value next time page is opened
When response is received, the data should be displyed on the main page using tiles
More details for each item are displayed using modal
Pagination and sorting are implemented on the page, clicks on respective controls (move to the next page, change sorting order) produce new requests to an api
While request is being made, loading indicator is shown to an user
Code smells (god component, a lot of duplication)
A lot of comments (commented code blocks, redundant comments, etc)
Errors in console in dev tools, 2 per each
Warnings in console in dev tools, 1 per each
